DOC.TEXT: American Car Sales Rise in Japan : Sales for Ford Motor Co . and Chrysler Corp . surged in 1993 , evidence that American cars are gaining acceptance among Japanese motorists.After a lengthy slump in the Japanese car market , Chrysler ' s sales jumped more_than 255 % last year , to 5 # 699 cars . Ford ' s sales rose 50.2 % , to 5 # 111 units . " Foreign car_makers posted gains in 1993 due_to the introduction of new models and right-hand-drive vehicles , as well as price_cuts , " said Kunihiko Ono , a vice chief_secretary for the Japan Automobile Importers Assn .
